nodes.aboutHeading: Firefly is on a mission to create the most immersive live experiences.

children.text: Everything has become possible through proprietary drone systems and processes, all paired with brilliant artistry. We’ve perfected a platform to create complex imagery; capable of telling any story, and all taking place hundreds of feet in the sky.

Today, Firefly Drone Shows is one of the only companies in the world to be fully licensed by the FAA. Our drone light shows are known for being the apex of events, and dazzling audiences around the world. Firefly’s safe and sustainable performance practices are non-polluting, zero debris, and are very low-risk for fire and wildlife hazards.
We look forward to sharing this same inspiration with your audience.
